name: Coleslaw 🥗
description: Craving a classic side dish? Whip up this delightful Coleslaw that's both creamy and tangy, perfect for your next BBQ or picnic. It's a breeze to make and will have everyone coming back for seconds!
instructions: In a large bowl, whisk together the mayonnaise, sour cream, lemon juice, vinegar, honey, salt, and pepper.
Add the green cabbage, red cabbage, and carrot, and toss to coat. Cover and chill until ready to serve.
